channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-3239|2024-08-01T20:05:08.328Z -- unknown -- post%20grid%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20wordpress%20blog%20plugin
item.description: The Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin WordPress plugin before 4.0.2 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-4305|2024-08-01T20:33:53.172Z -- unknown -- post%20grid%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20wordpress%20blog%20plugin
item.description: The Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin WordPress plugin before 4.1.0 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
